Loyalty in grain, or, Act of oblivion repeal'd by Heraclitus
1 sheet ([2] p.)
Published by Langley Curtis ..., London : 1682.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Heraclitus is a pseudonym for Thomas Flatman. Broadside.
